title: rawnet
author: rawnet
content: Hi,What are Your best settings for mining Ravecoin on nVidia RTX 3070 (STRIX)?What highest hashrate is possible now on that card?

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: For RVN the best settings are for non-LHR cards:Core Voltage (VDD): N/APower Limit (%): 60% or 150wCore Clock (CClock): 100Memory Clock (MClock): +1000 or 2000 (2000 is for Linux)Fan Speed (%): 70% ± based on your tempsFor RVN the best settings for LHR cards:Core Voltage (VDD): N/APower Limit (%): 65% or 170wCore Clock (CClock): NAMemory Clock (MClock): +1600 or 3200 (3200 is for Linux)Fan Speed (%): 70% ± based on your temps.Hash rate depends but they should do like 30 Mhsh for the non-LHR cards.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: KawPow is not the best algorithm for mining on the nVidia RTX 3070 graphics card.The calculator shows a profit of 5 cents at an electricity price of 5 cents. This is very little profit for such a video card.https://whattomine.com/gpus/48-nvidia-geforce-rtx-3070?cost=0.05&cost_currency=USDMine other coins and then buy Ravencoin and you will get at least 5 times more

comments.author: ZeeeN
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on September 16, 2022, 09:56:48 AMKawPow is not the best algorithm for mining on the nVidia RTX 3070 graphics card.The calculator shows a profit of 5 cents at an electricity price of 5 cents. This is very little profit for such a video card.https://whattomine.com/gpus/48-nvidia-geforce-rtx-3070?cost=0.05&cost_currency=USDMine other coins and then buy Ravencoin and you will get at least 5 times morewhat best algo for 3070?

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: Quote from: ZeeeN on September 30, 2022, 02:43:37 PMwhat best algo for 3070?It's not a rule, profitability always change, but today for example Whattomine shows Cuckatoo32 algo, mining Grin-CT32(GRIN) as the most profitable coin.It's interesting to see whattomine regularlyLink to WhatToMine 3070 profitability

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: ZeeeN on September 30, 2022, 02:43:37 PMQuote from: FP91G on September 16, 2022, 09:56:48 AMKawPow is not the best algorithm for mining on the nVidia RTX 3070 graphics card.The calculator shows a profit of 5 cents at an electricity price of 5 cents. This is very little profit for such a video card.https://whattomine.com/gpus/48-nvidia-geforce-rtx-3070?cost=0.05&cost_currency=USDMine other coins and then buy Ravencoin and you will get at least 5 times morewhat best algo for 3070?There is no better algorithm for mining on this video card right now. If your electricity costs 5 cents, then an average profit of 5-10 cents a day makes mining on this video card meaningless. And you still need to buy additional equipment for the mining farm: a motherboard, a processor and other equipment.
